review:
Doctor is awesome… very friendly.. patient (despite being one of the busiest OBGYNs in Chennai) 
She’s such a nice person to talk to and clarify issues.
Even after a long day of surgeries … she is so kind and nice to patients … I have only the best things to say about her …

I had a right ovarian cyst laparoscopic surgery done by Dr Meenakshi Sundaram 2 days back. She gave me current diagnosis in the very first visit and suggested me right course of action. I will be forever thankful to Dr Meenakshi for helping me out and giving me right treatment. She is very professional and excellent doctor.

I had bilateral ovary cyst which was quite large. 
Dr. Sundaram operated upon me. I recovered quickly with all the vital physiology working fine within a few hours. I had a wonderful experience. I strongly recommend Dr Sundaram.

Dr Meenakshi sundaram is god 
Excellent 
Fantastic 
Very kind 
Very effecient 
Very polite 
Full of talents 
Laparoscopic surgery master 
Unbeaten 
I give her one hundred  out hundred

review:
**** *** ******* Was on phone all the time during my visit and didnt even bother to ask full details.
She didnot even bother to ask about my thyroid disrder *** ******* ***** ** ******* ** ************* * *** ** ******* **** 
I visited Apollo Cradle/Women's hospital, Greams road, Chennai.
Paid her consultation fees of 1000 INR and left. Didnt even bother to do the tests.
Very bad experience. Please do not go ** *** *** Not at all recommended.
Appreciated her professionalism and clarity in diagnosis.  Has a strong, sharp and efficient team assisting her as well.

review: ************ ******** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** ***** She is so calm and polite with the patients and hears their problems . Very much satisfied with her response although I'm her old patient.
****** *** *** Friendly. Made me feel comfortable. But too many unnecessary follow ups in the name of making more cash. Wait time is also too much. Hospital needs to improve its hospitality.
I am very happy for treatment by the dr Meenakshi sundaram.her experience is very good.she is best gynecologist
